sn38.4:4.1: “Kimatthiyaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti?
sn38.4:4.2: “Dukkhassa kho, āvuso, pariññatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti.
sn38.4:4.3: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38.4:4.4: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38.4:4.5: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38.4:5.1: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etassa dukkhassa pariññāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38.4:5.4: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti.
sn38.4:5.5: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāya.
